posts.author: The Twin Crowns (Lishhhhmm & panosusa)
posts.title: Decree I - Proclamation of the Empire
posts.summary: The City is formally declared an Empire under the equal and sovereign rule of the Twin Crowns.
posts.body:
By the united will of the Twin Crowns and the peoples of the City, the administrative union of the founding regions is hereby proclaimed an Empire.

The City stands as the Imperial Capital, and Lishhhhmm and panosusa are recognized as its sole and equal Emperors.

From this day forward, all authority flows from the Twin Crowns, and all future regions shall enter the realm under Imperial law.

posts.author: The Twin Crowns (Lishhhhmm & panosusa)
posts.title: Decree II - Recognition of the First Duchy
posts.summary: The Third Village is recognized as the first Duchy beyond the Capital, and ChristosZita is confirmed as its Duke.
posts.body:
The Third Village, having accepted the Imperial Proposal and fulfilled the conditions of entry, is hereby recognized as the first Duchy beyond the Capital.

ChristosZita is confirmed as Duke and charged with stewardship, production, and the faithful observance of Imperial law.

May this Duchy stand as the first pillar of a growing realm.

posts.author: The Twin Crowns (Lishhhhmm & panosusa)
posts.title: Decree III - Ratification of the Imperial Constitution
posts.summary: The Constitution is affirmed as the supreme and binding law of the Empire, governing all regions, rulers, and citizens.
posts.body:
By the will of the Dual Emperors and the united peoples of the Empire, the Constitution is hereby ratified and proclaimed as the supreme and binding law of the realm.

All subjects, citizens, dukes, and officers are required to uphold its Articles, honor its authority, and submit disputes to the lawful mechanisms established therein.

So declared under the vigilance of the Twin Crowns.

posts.author: The Twin Crowns (Lishhhhmm & panosusa)
posts.title: Decree IV - Recognition of the Imperial Industrial Zone
posts.summary: The central industrial district of the Capital is formally recognized as an Imperial Zone under direct authority of the Twin Crowns.
posts.body:
By authority of the Twin Crowns, the industrial district within the Capital is hereby recognized as the Imperial Industrial Zone.

This zone shall serve as the foundation of production, resource processing, and material distribution for the entire Empire, operating under direct Imperial oversight.

All facilities within the zone are designated strategic assets. Their protection, maintenance, and expansion are matters of Imperial priority.

May this district stand as the engine of prosperity and strength for the realm.

posts.author: The Twin Crowns (Lishhhhmm & panosusa)
posts.title: Decree V - Commencement of the Construction of the Empire Hall
posts.summary: Construction is authorized to begin on the Empire Hall, the future seat of Imperial governance and ceremony.
posts.body:
Let it be known that, by decree of the Twin Crowns, construction shall commence upon the Empire Hall, destined to stand as the foremost civic and ceremonial structure of the Empire.

The Empire Hall shall serve as the seat of Imperial governance, the meeting place of the Imperial Council, and the site of proclamations, ceremonies, and judgments of state.

Its foundations shall be laid within the Capital, and its design shall reflect the authority, unity, and permanence of the Empire.

May its walls rise in strength, and may its halls endure for all ages.

posts.author: Imperial Scribes
posts.title: Chronicle I - The Union of Two Villages
posts.summary: From a narrow sea passage to a single City: the founding moment that made an Empire possible.
posts.body:
Village A and Village B once stood apart, divided only by a short sea passage. With growth came vision: shared industry, shared governance, and a unified center.

Industry rose in Village B where land was plentiful. A common administrative heart followed, and the people of Village A gradually relocated. Part of Village B was cleared to make space.

Thus the settlements became one: The City, ruled jointly by the Twin Crowns.
